headline: Dizzying Day For President  Caps a Year Full of Them
abstract: The president monitored a Middle East crisis from his golf club, threatened Iran and implored reporters to be “honorable” in 2020.
lead_paragraph: PALM BEACH, Fla. — It was perhaps fitting that President Trump ended another dizzying year in office with a crisis-driven day of surreal contrasts, one that began with him tracking a Middle East emergency from his golf club and ended with a tuxedo-clad president holding forth about North Korea, Iran and impeachment and vaping on a red carpet over the thumping din of party music.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
